COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL_TINT.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL_TINT.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL_TINT

BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY_TR.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_DARK_TRANSPARENT instead. These RGBA values need to be updated if BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY changes, solves webkit bug
BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY_TR.name: BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY_TRANSPARENT

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT_2.comment: Used when further differentiation is needed because colorBackground and colorBackgroundAlt are both being used in close proximity.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT_2.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT_2

COLOR_BACKGROUND_UTILITY_BAR_HOVER.comment: Hover color for utility bar item.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_UTILITY_BAR_HOVER.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_UTILITY_BAR_HOVER

COLOR_BACKGROUND_OFFLINE.comment: Color for UI elements related to the offline state.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_OFFLINE.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_OFFLINE

BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY_DARK instead.
BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY.name: BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_SECONDARY

BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY_TRAN.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY_TRANSPARENT instead. These RGBA values need to be updated if BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY changes, solves webkit bug
BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY_TRAN.name: BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY_TRANSPARENT

COLOR_BACKGROUND_BROWSER.comment: Secondary top bar background color (child browser, file preview, etc.)
COLOR_BACKGROUND_BROWSER.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_BROWSER

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL.comment: Used as the default background color for temporary dialog elements, such as the progress spinner background.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PAYLOAD.comment: Background color for payloads in the feed.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_PAYLOAD.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_PAYLOAD

PAGE_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY instead.
PAGE_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY.name: PAGE_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE_DARK.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE_DARK
COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE_DARK.comment: Used as gray background in conjunction with Shade when more contrast is desired.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ACTIONBAR_ICON_UTILITY.comment: Background for utility icons that live in the action bar on mobile.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_ACTIONBAR_ICON_UTILITY.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_ACTIONBAR_ICON_UTILITY

BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY instead.
BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY.name: BRAND_BAND_COLOR_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY

COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_HOVER.comment: Hover stroke color for our product brand blue.
COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_HOVER.name: COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_HOVER

COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_ACTIVE.comment: Active stroke color for our product brand blue.
COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_ACTIVE.name: COLOR_STROKE_BRAND_ACTIVE

COLOR_STROKE_HEADER_BUTTON.comment: Stroke color for our global header buttons.
COLOR_STROKE_HEADER_BUTTON.name: COLOR_STROKE_HEADER_BUTTON

SHADOW_HARD_PRIMARY.comment: Hard dropshadow found on general UI elements such as containers
SHADOW_HARD_PRIMARY.name: SHADOW_HARD_PRIMARY

SHADOW_SOFT_PRIMARY.comment: Soft dropshadow found on general UI elements such as containers
SHADOW_SOFT_PRIMARY.name: SHADOW_SOFT_PRIMARY

COLOR_TEXT_TOAST.comment: Color for text on toast messages.
COLOR_TEXT_TOAST.name: COLOR_TEXT_TOAST

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_ACTIVE.comment: Used as the background color for the active state on rows or items on list-like components.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_ACTIVE.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_ACTIVE

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_HOVER.comment: Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_HOVER.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_HOVER

COLOR_BACKGROUND_INFO.comment: Background color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).
COLOR_BACKGROUND_INFO.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_INFO

COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL.comment: Used as background for loading stencils on white background.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL

COLOR_BACKGROUND.comment: Default background color for the whole app.
COLOR_BACKGROUND.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND

COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL_ALT.comment: Used as an alternate background for loading stencils on gray backgrounds.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL_ALT.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL_ALT

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_SELECTED.comment: Used as the background color for selected rows or items on list-like components.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_SELECTED.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_SELECTED

COLOR_BORDER.comment: Default border color for UI elements.
COLOR_BORDER.name: COLOR_BORDER

COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR.comment: Lightest separator color - used as default separator on white backgrounds.
COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR.name: COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR

COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT.comment: Medium separator color - used as default separator on light gray backgrounds.
COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT.name: COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT

COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT_2.comment: Darkest separator color - used as an alternate separator color when more differentiation is desired.
COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT_2.name: COLOR_BORDER_SEPARATOR_ALT_2

COLOR_BORDER_INFO.comment: Border color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).
COLOR_BORDER_INFO.name: COLOR_BORDER_INFO

COLOR_BORDER_OFFLINE.comment: Border color for UI elements related to the offline state.
COLOR_BORDER_OFFLINE.name: COLOR_BORDER_OFFLINE

COLOR_BORDER_SELECTION_ACTIVE.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being clicked. Specific to builders.
COLOR_BORDER_SELECTION_ACTIVE.name: COLOR_BORDER_SELECTION_ACTIVE

COLOR_TEXT_WEAK.comment: Color for text that is purposefully de-emphasized to create visual hierarchy.
COLOR_TEXT_WEAK.name: COLOR_TEXT_WEAK

COLOR_TEXT_PLACEHOLDER_INVERSE.comment: Input placeholder text on dark backgrounds.
COLOR_TEXT_PLACEHOLDER_INVERSE.name: COLOR_TEXT_PLACEHOLDER_INVERSE

COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE.comment: Inverse text color for dark backgrounds
COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE.name: COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE

COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_WEAK.comment: Weak inverse text color for dark backgrounds
COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_WEAK.name: COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_WEAK

COLOR_BACKGROUND_NOTIFICATION_NEW.comment: Background color for a new notification list item.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_NOTIFICATION_NEW.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_NOTIFICATION_NEW

COLOR_BACKGROUND_BACKDROP_TINT.comment: The color of the mask overlay that provides user feedback on interaction.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_BACKDROP_TINT.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_BACKDROP_TINT

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR

COLOR_BACKGROUND_POST.comment: Background color of comment posts in the feed.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_POST.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_POST

COLOR_BACKGROUND_IMAGE_OVERLAY.comment: Color of mask overlay that sits on top of an image when text is present.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_IMAGE_OVERLAY.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_IMAGE_OVERLAY

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE.comment: Used as gray background when more contrast is desired.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR_TRACK.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar track.
COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR_TRACK.name: COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR_TRACK

COLOR_BORDER_INPUT_DISABLED.comment: Border color on disabled form elements.
COLOR_BORDER_INPUT_DISABLED.name: COLOR_BORDER_INPUT_DISABLED

COLOR_BORDER_BUTTON_DEFAULT.comment: Border color for default secondary button
COLOR_BORDER_BUTTON_DEFAULT.name: COLOR_BORDER_BUTTON_DEFAULT

SHADOW_BUTTON_FOCUS_INVERSE.comment: Custom glow for focus states on UI elements with explicit containers on dark or vibrantly colored backgrounds.
SHADOW_BUTTON_FOCUS_INVERSE.name: SHADOW_BUTTON_FOCUS_INVERSE

SHADOW_LINK_FOCUS_INVERSE.comment: Custom glow for focus states on UI link elements with explicit containers on dark or vibrantly colored backgrounds.
SHADOW_LINK_FOCUS_INVERSE.name: SHADOW_LINK_FOCUS_INVERSE

CARD_SHADOW.comment: Hard dropshadow found on outer cards
CARD_SHADOW.name: CARD_SHADOW

COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_ACTIVE.comment: Icon color on dark background - active state
COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_ACTIVE.name: COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_ACTIVE

COLOR_TEXT_TAB_LABEL_DISABLED.comment: Color for disabled text in a tab group.
COLOR_TEXT_TAB_LABEL_DISABLED.name: COLOR_TEXT_TAB_LABEL_DISABLED

COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_ACTIVE.comment: Active state on a standalone link on a dark background.
COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_ACTIVE.name: COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_ACTIVE

COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT_BORDERLESS.comment: Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT_BORDERLESS.name: COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT_BORDERLESS

COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_DISABLED.comment: Text color for default secondary button - disabled state
COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_DISABLED.name: COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_DISABLED

COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT.comment: Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT.name: COLOR_TEXT_ICON_DEFAULT_HINT

COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_HOVER.comment: Hover state on a standalone link on a dark background.
COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_HOVER.name: COLOR_TEXT_INVERSE_HOVER

COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_INVERSE.comment: Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_INVERSE.name: COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_INVERSE

COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_HINT.comment: Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_HINT.name: COLOR_TEXT_BUTTON_DEFAULT_HINT

COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_HOVER.comment: Icon color on dark background - hover state
COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_HOVER.name: COLOR_TEXT_ICON_INVERSE_HOVER
